title: cultural_data_National_Postal_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.culturalspot.mobile.smithsoniansnationalpostalmuseum.
Application Name: National Postal Museum.
Number of Reviews: 6.00.
Application Description: The Smithsonian National Postal Museum App is your mobile window on the museum. You'll learn about our vast collection of stamps and other artifacts, and the fascinating history they commemorate, through a growing collection of mobile exhibits.The National Postal Museum houses one of the largest and most significant philatelic and postal history collections in the world and one of the world’s most comprehensive library resources on philately and postal history. The museum’s many exhibition galleries present America’s postal history from Colonial times to the present, while its collections contain prestigious U.S. and international postal issues and specialized collections, archival postal documents and 3-D objects.This app allows you to share in our collections anytime; anywhere.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 807.00.
Overall Rate: 3.80.
First Page Reviews: I would have liked to use this app, but I only got as far as a message that there was no network connection. None of the other apps I use has this complaint. Not sure what's wrong, and I'm not going to waste time figuring it out. Looking Good! I hope to see more about other exibits and special collections, the videos added a nice touch. Thank you..
